<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements the spill code placement analysis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each edge bundle corresponds to a node in a Hopfield network. Constraints on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// basic blocks are weighted by the block frequency and added to become the node</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bias.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transparent basic blocks have the variable live through, but don&#39;t care if it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is spilled or in a register. These blocks become connections in the Hopfield</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// network, again weighted by block frequency.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Hopfield network minimizes (possibly locally) its energy function:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   E = -sum&#95;n V&#95;n &#42; ( B&#95;n + sum&#95;&#123;n, m linked by b&#125; V&#95;m &#42; F&#95;b )</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The energy function represents the expected spill code execution frequency,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or the cost of spilling. This is a Lyapunov function which never increases</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when a node is updated. It is guaranteed to converge to a local minimum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Node - Each edge bundle corresponds to a Hopfield node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The node contains precomputed frequency data that only depends on the CFG,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// but Bias and Links are computed each time placeSpills is called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The node Value is positive when the variable should be in a register. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// value can change when linked nodes change, but convergence is very fast</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// because all weights are positive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node">SpillPlacement::Node</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// BiasN - Sum of blocks that prefer a spill.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// BiasP - Sum of blocks that prefer a register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Value - Output value of this node computed from the Bias and links.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is always on of the values &#123;-1, 0, 1&#125;. A positive number means the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// variable should go in a register through this bundle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mustSpill - Return True if this node is so biased that it must spill.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#ae39aa56454ff85c86ddd1aca307354bd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#ae39aa56454ff85c86ddd1aca307354bd">mustSpill</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We must spill if Bias &lt; -sum(weights) or the MustSpill flag was set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BiasN is saturated when MustSpill is set, make sure this still returns</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// true when the RHS saturates. Note that SumLinkWeights includes Threshold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a2b91674cb12c7e0eb5bddcd71213e4c6">SumLinkWeights</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// addLink - Add a link to bundle b with weight w.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a414c03213909b5fd790e6f1b505b7099"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a414c03213909b5fd790e6f1b505b7099">addLink</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> b, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> w) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update cached sum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a2b91674cb12c7e0eb5bddcd71213e4c6">SumLinkWeights</a> += w;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There can be multiple links to the same bundle, add them up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::pair&lt;BlockFrequency, unsigned&gt; &amp;L : <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L.second == b) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">        L.first += w;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This must be the first link to b.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(w, b));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// addBias - Bias this node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a03bf04c760f4e0dc8f8673a6dbbc1f37"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a03bf04c760f4e0dc8f8673a6dbbc1f37">addBias</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#a6228da6ce1f2cdae97b17637c061011e">freq</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8c">BorderConstraint</a> direction) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8caca6da2dad218232636b80854d81a6e1c">PrefReg</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#a6228da6ce1f2cdae97b17637c061011e">freq</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8caf5efe10871d66719c8668d09d768e740">PrefSpill</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#a6228da6ce1f2cdae97b17637c061011e">freq</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8ca043a091e52f465df92623f5f17477837">MustSpill</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a5bd2a8de4fde83093df0cc2415db2312">BlockFrequency::max</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// update - Recompute Value from Bias and Links. Return true when node</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// preference changes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a25feab88416725ad9114fbb86af5dfc1"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a25feab88416725ad9114fbb86af5dfc1">update</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node">Node</a> nodes&#91;&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Threshold) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the weighted sum of inputs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> SumN = <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a370ae71068f6725ac2c6b61cf66a05b4">BiasN</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> SumP = <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a67abf92d6eabc03f37e9a2bd422e290a">BiasP</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::pair&lt;BlockFrequency, unsigned&gt; &amp;L : <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (nodes&#91;L.second&#93;.Value == -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        SumN += L.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (nodes&#91;L.second&#93;.Value == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">        SumP += L.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each weighted sum is going to be less than the total frequency of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bundle. Ideally, we should simply set Value = sign(SumP - SumN), but we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will add a dead zone around 0 for two reasons:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  1 It avoids arbitrary bias when all links are 0 as is possible during</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     initial iterations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  2 It helps tame rounding errors when the links nominally sum to 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a15e88c2cf83e7164d2d0d85ed00f9b31">preferReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SumN &gt;= SumP + Threshold)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SumP &gt;= SumN + Threshold)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a> != <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a15e88c2cf83e7164d2d0d85ed00f9b31">preferReg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#af1f662c46e92ef73f72533ef32887586"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#af1f662c46e92ef73f72533ef32887586">getDissentingNeighbors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparseset">SparseSet&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8a4ee29ca12c7d126654bd0e5275de6135">List</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node">Node</a> nodes&#91;&#93;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Elt : <a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a5a13362b22c15eb1235eacd5f8440ed4">Links</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = Elt.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Neighbors that already have the same value are not going to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// change because of this node changing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a> != nodes&#91;n&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/structs/spillplacement/node/#a6155db02c64ef3abd03259a7dba04ea9">Value</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8a4ee29ca12c7d126654bd0e5275de6135">List</a>.insert(n);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  setThreshold(MBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo/#aa9c041cb61532576659d652739439acc">getEntryFreq</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : mf) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Num = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getNumber();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">/// activate - mark node n as active if it wasn&#39;t already.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SpillPlacement::activate(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">  TodoList.insert(n);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ActiveNodes-&gt;test(n))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  ActiveNodes-&gt;set(n);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  nodes&#91;n&#93;.clear(Threshold);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Very large bundles usually come from big switches, indirect branches,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// landing pads, or loops with many &#39;continue&#39; statements. It is difficult to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocate registers when so many different blocks are involved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Give a small negative bias to large bundles such that a substantial</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fraction of the connected blocks need to be interested before we consider</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expanding the region through the bundle. This helps compile time by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// limiting the number of blocks visited and the number of links in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hopfield network.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (bundles-&gt;getBlocks(n).size() &gt; 100) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    nodes&#91;n&#93;.BiasP = BlockFrequency(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">    BlockFrequency BiasN = MBFI-&gt;getEntryFreq();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">    BiasN &gt;&gt;= 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">    nodes&#91;n&#93;.BiasN = BiasN;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Set the threshold for a given entry frequency.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Set the threshold relative to \\c Entry.  Since the threshold is used as a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">/// bound on the open interval (-Threshold;Threshold), 1 is the minimum</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">/// threshold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SpillPlacement::setThreshold(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Entry) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Apparently 2 is a good threshold when Entry==2^14, but we need to scale</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it.  Divide by 2^13, rounding as appropriate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Freq = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.getFrequency();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a> = (Freq &gt;&gt; 13) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Freq &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; 12));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">  Threshold = BlockFrequency(std::max(UINT64&#95;C(1), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">/// addConstraints - Compute node biases and weights from a set of constraints.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Set a bit in NodeMask for each active node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a0d46b9b2cb2caf78e65bbd56644fc0f2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a0d46b9b2cb2caf78e65bbd56644fc0f2">SpillPlacement::addConstraints</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BlockConstraint&gt;</a> LiveBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spillplacement/blockconstraint">BlockConstraint</a> &amp;LB : LiveBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Freq = BlockFrequencies&#91;LB.Number&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Live-in to block?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LB.Entry != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8ca49b6f21cf41c5b608cb5645bc70d36b8">DontCare</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ib = bundles-&gt;getBundle(LB.Number, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">      activate(ib);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">      nodes&#91;ib&#93;.addBias(Freq, LB.Entry);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Live-out from block?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LB.Exit != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#ab09623fee8a653165a7cc624b8eaaa8ca49b6f21cf41c5b608cb5645bc70d36b8">DontCare</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ob = bundles-&gt;getBundle(LB.Number, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">      activate(ob);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">      nodes&#91;ob&#93;.addBias(Freq, LB.Exit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment">/// addPrefSpill - Same as addConstraints(PrefSpill)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">/// iterate - Repeatedly update the Hopfield nodes until stability or the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">/// maximum number of iterations is reached.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a8d70270c78d36ddb40a8b782e141b63a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spillplacement/#a8d70270c78d36ddb40a8b782e141b63a">SpillPlacement::iterate</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We do not need to push those node in the todolist.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// They are already been proceeded as part of the previous iteration.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">  RecentPositive.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since the last iteration, the todolist have been augmented by calls</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to addConstraints, addLinks, and co.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the network energy starting at this new frontier.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The call to ::update will add the nodes that changed into the todolist.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Limit = bundles-&gt;getNumBundles() &#42; 10;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Limit-- &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; !TodoList.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> n = TodoList.pop&#95;back&#95;val();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!update(n))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (nodes&#91;n&#93;.preferReg())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
